001package org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.jsonrpc.service;
002
003import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Flowable;
004import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
005import io.reactivex.rxjava3.disposables.Disposable;
006import io.reactivex.rxjava3.processors.BehaviorProcessor;
007import io.reactivex.rxjava3.processors.FlowableProcessor;
008import org.bitcoinj.base.Sha256Hash;
009import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.ChainTip;
010import org.consensusj.bitcoin.json.pojo.TxOutSetInfo;
011import org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.jsonrpc.RxBitcoinClient;
012import org.slf4j.Logger;
013import org.slf4j.LoggerFactory;
014
015import java.io.Closeable;
016import java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture;
017import java.util.concurrent.ConcurrentHashMap;
018import java.util.concurrent.atomic.AtomicInteger;
019
020/**
021 * Service to return a stream of TxOutSetInfos for a given blockchain/client.
022 * Updates are triggered on new blocks (via {@link org.consensusj.bitcoin.rx.ChainTipService} a cache
023 * is used to prevent fetches of TxOutSetInfos already fetched (e.g. on blockchain re-org) and
024 * {@code MAX_OUTSTANDING_CALLS} is used to prevent overloading the server (e.g. during blockchain sync)
025 */
026public class TxOutSetService implements Closeable {
027    private static final Logger log = LoggerFactory.getLogger(TxOutSetService.class);
028    private final RxBitcoinClient client;
029    private final FlowableProcessor<TxOutSetInfo> txOutSetProcessor = BehaviorProcessor.create();
030    private final int CACHE_BLOCK_DEPTH = 1;
031    private final int MAX_OUTSTANDING_CALLS = 2;
032    private final AtomicInteger outstandingCalls = new AtomicInteger(0);
033    private final ConcurrentHashMap<Sha256Hash, TxOutSetInfo> txOutSetCache = new ConcurrentHashMap<>();
034    private Disposable txOutSetSubscription;
035    private CompletableFuture<TxOutSetInfo> lastCall;
036
037    public TxOutSetService(RxBitcoinClient client) {
038        this.client = client;
039    }
040
041    private synchronized void start() {
042        if (txOutSetSubscription == null) {
043            txOutSetSubscription = client
044                    .chainTipPublisher()
045                    .doOnNext(this::onNewBlock)
046                    .flatMapSingle(this::fetchSingle)
047                    .subscribe(txOutSetProcessor::onNext, txOutSetProcessor::onError, txOutSetProcessor::onComplete);
048        }
049    }
050
051    public Flowable<TxOutSetInfo> getTxOutSetPublisher() {
052        start();
053        return txOutSetProcessor;
054    }
055    
056    private void onNewBlock(ChainTip tip) {
057        // Remove all cache entries with txOutSetInfo.height < tip.height - CACHE_BLOCK_DEPTH;
058        log.info("TxOutSetCache: checking {} entries for entries more than {} blocks old", txOutSetCache.size(), CACHE_BLOCK_DEPTH);
059        txOutSetCache.values().removeIf(txOutSetInfo -> {
060            boolean remove = txOutSetInfo.getHeight() < (tip.getHeight() - CACHE_BLOCK_DEPTH);
061            if (remove) {
062                log.info("Removing TxOutSetInfo For {}/{}", txOutSetInfo.getHeight(), txOutSetInfo.getBestBlock());
063            }
064            return remove;
065        });
066    }
067
068    private CompletableFuture<TxOutSetInfo> fetchCache(ChainTip tip) {
069        TxOutSetInfo cached = txOutSetCache.get(tip.getHash());
070        if (cached != null) {
071            return CompletableFuture.completedFuture(cached);
072        } else {
073            return fetch(tip);
074        }
075    }
076
077    private CompletableFuture<TxOutSetInfo> fetch(ChainTip tip) {
078        if (outstandingCalls.intValue() >= MAX_OUTSTANDING_CALLS) {
079            // TODO: Use a synthesized totalCoins (e.g. lastValue + blockreward * delta_blocks)
080            log.info("Re-using last call because {} outstanding calls. ", MAX_OUTSTANDING_CALLS);
081        } else {
082            int calls = outstandingCalls.incrementAndGet();
083            log.info("Fetching TxOutSetInfo For {}/{} ({} outstanding calls)", tip.getHeight(), tip.getHash(), calls);
084            lastCall = client.supplyAsync(client::getTxOutSetInfo)
085                    .whenComplete(this::fetchCompletion);
086        }
087        return lastCall;
088    }
089
090    private void fetchCompletion(TxOutSetInfo info, Throwable t) {
091        int calls = outstandingCalls.decrementAndGet();
092        if (info != null) {
093            log.info("Completion result for: {}/{} ({} outstanding calls)", info.getHeight(), info.getBestBlock(), calls);
094            txOutSetCache.put(info.getBestBlock(), info);
095        } else {
096            log.info("Completion throwable: {} ({} outstanding calls)", t, calls);
097        }
098    }
099    
100    private Single<TxOutSetInfo> fetchSingle(ChainTip tip) {
101        return Single.defer(() -> Single.fromCompletionStage(fetchCache(tip)));
102    }
103    
104    @Override
105    public void close()  {
106        if (txOutSetSubscription != null) {
107            txOutSetSubscription.dispose();
108        }
109    }
110}
